title: AE51004: Aircraft Fuel System - Quick Facts
text:
AE51004
Course name | Aircraft Fuel System
Offered by | Aerospace Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE31001 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsFuel performance in engines; combustion efficiency: effects of altitude, fuel volatility, injection and molecular structures of fuel on combustion efficiency; Altitude operational limits; Carbon deposits, smoking, Starting performance, ignition characteristics; Fuel behavior in aircraft fuel systems, fuel specification and availability, potential low cost fuels, residual fuels for gas turbine applications.
